0.1.0.name: wordpress/lexidef
0.1.0.description:
LexiDef allows you to set links to Lexiology.com Dictionary definitions of words/phrases containing meaning, audio, phonetics, usages and other informations.

*Write "{ld:polemic}" to create a link to the english lemma of "polemic".
